import React, { Component } from 'react' import NewsItem from './NewsItem' export class News extends Component { articles = [ { "source": { "id": "reuters", "name": "Reuters" }, "author": null, "title": "U.S. crude stocks highest since June 2021 as fuel demand falls -EIA", "description": "U.S. crude inventories rose last week as demand for fuels tapered off, and while the increase was less than expected, crude stocks reached the highest level since June 2021, the Energy Information Administration (EIA) said on Wednesday.", "url": "https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/us-crude-stocks-highest-since-june-2021-fuel-demand-falls-eia-2023-01-25/", "urlToImage": "https://www.reuters.com/resizer/w_gbiXO658VBHc8YMyiOCcsse0k=/1200x628/smart/filters:quality(80)/cloudfront-us-east-2.images.arcpublishing.com/reuters/ILYPRTUKYFPDHKIQK5XADV44YY.jpg", "publishedAt": "2023-01-25T18:40:10Z", "content": "Jan 25 (Reuters) - U.S. crude inventories rose last week as demand for fuels tapered off, and while the increase was less than expected, crude stocks reached the highest level since June 2021, the En… [+2338 chars]" }, { "source": { "id": "australian-financial-review", "name": "Australian Financial Review" }, "author": "Timothy Moore", "title": "Wall Street: US stocks knocked by Microsoft’s ‘conservative’ outlook", "description": "Shares fell in New York, though pared losses by midday, as investors positioned for lower corporate profits. $A rises. Tesla reports after the closing bell.", "url": "http://www.afr.com/markets/equity-markets/us-stocks-knocked-by-microsoft-s-conservative-outlook-20230126-p5cfjq", "urlToImage": "https://static.ffx.io/images/$zoom_0.1961%2C$multiply_4%2C$ratio_1.777778%2C$width_1059%2C$x_0%2C$y_0/t_crop_custom/c_scale%2Cw_800%2Cq_88%2Cf_jpg/t_afr_no_label_no_age_social_wm/d11a490cc5b6b934ae2522e043cebd33454a055a", "publishedAt": "2023-01-25T17:54:11Z", "content": "Higgins also said when earnings have faltered, the S&P 500 hasnt typically bottomed out until three to six months before the end of the accompanying recession.We anticipate that the index will fa… [+4142 chars]" }, { "source": { "id": "independent", "name": "Independent" }, "author": "Shweta Sharma", "title": "Ukraine news – live: German tanks won’t make it to frontline for three months, defence minister says", "description": "Berlin will provide 14 Leopard 2 tanks from military stocks as a first step, a statement from the German government said", "url": "http://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/europe/russia-ukraine-putin-war-nato-tanks-germany-b2268625.html", "urlToImage": "https://static.independent.co.uk/2023/01/23/17/Russia_Ukraine_War_50399.jpg?quality=75&width=1200&auto=webp", "publishedAt": "2023-01-25T17:06:49Z", "content": "For free real time breaking news alerts sent straight to your inbox sign up to our breaking news emails\r\nSign up to our free breaking news emails\r\nIt will take about three months for the first Leopar… [+6849 chars]" }, { "source": { "id": "les-echos", "name": "Les Echos" }, "author": "Solveig Godeluck", "title": "Les Etats-Unis enverront 31 chars Abrams en Ukraine dans plusieurs mois", "description": "La livraison prendra du temps car les chars ne sont pas en stock. De plus, les opérateurs devront suivre une formation. Washington prépare la reconquête du territoire ukrainien à long terme.", "url": "https://www.lesechos.fr/monde/enjeux-internationaux/les-etats-unis-enverront-31-chars-abrams-en-ukraine-dans-plusieurs-mois-1900538", "urlToImage": "https://media.lesechos.com/api/v1/images/view/63d16110d0e57c7d3e26fc40/1280x720/0703278934056-web-tete.jpg", "publishedAt": "2023-01-25T17:02:15Z", "content": "Au onzième mois de guerre en Ukraine, les Etats-Unis ont fini par donner leur feu vert à la livraison de leur bijou, le char Abrams M1. hits tech stocks, earnings disappoint", "description": "Wall Street's main indexes dropped on Wednesday, with the Nasdaq down 2% as Microsoft's outlook weighed down technology stocks, while a bleak In market downturns, the rules may change", "description": "CFOs can return profits to shareholders with dividends and buybacks. Here's how they may fare during a stock market selloff or recession.", "url": "https://fortune.com/2022/06/01/buybacks-vs-dividends-stock-market-downturns-recession-cfo-daily-newsletter/", "urlToImage": "https://content.fortune.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/GettyImages-1310316502.jpg?resize=1200,600", "publishedAt": "2022-06-01T10:15:00Z", "content": "Skip to Content" } ] constructor(){ super(); console.log("Hello I am a Construction from News component"); this.state = { articles: this.articles, loading: false } } render() { return (
